my_toolkit.math_ops.basic module

Math Operations Package

This module contains basic mathematical functions.

Add two numbers.

my_toolkit.math_ops.basic.divide(a: float, b: float) → float[source]

Divide a by b.

my_toolkit.math_ops.basic.multiply(a: float, b: float) → float[source]

Multiply two numbers.

my_toolkit.math_ops.basic.subtract(a: float, b: float) → float[source]

Subtract b from a.

Module contents

Source code:

 1"""
 2Math Operations Package
 3========================
 4This module contains basic mathematical functions.
 5"""
 6
 7def add(a: float, b: float) -> float:
 8    """Add two numbers."""
 9    return a + b
10
11def subtract(a: float, b: float) -> float:
12    """Subtract b from a."""
13    return a - b
14
15def multiply(a: float, b: float) -> float:
16    """Multiply two numbers."""
17    return a * b
18
19def divide(a: float, b: float) -> float:
20    """Divide a by b."""
21    if b == 0:
22        raise ValueError("Cannot divide by zero.")
23    return a / b
